author: Staff report
title: 5 things to do this week
text: 5 things to do this week Here's five things to do this week. Comment Posted Oct. 25, 2015 at 10:00 AM By Staff report Posted Oct. 25, 2015 at 10:00 AM Holland, Mich. Monday: Team Trivia, 7-9 p.m., The Curragh, 73 E. Eighth St.; Free; (616) 393-6340. Test your trivia knowledge at this weekly event at the local pub. Tuesday: Selfie Week at Outdoor Discovery Center, 9 a.m.-5 p.m., ODC, 4214 56th St.; Free; (616) 393-9453. Join the scavenger hunt through social media by taking a selfie at the places shown the the ODC's Facebook page and post it to the wall or instagram page to be entered into a contest. Thursday: Cappon House by Candlelight: Hallowe'en Haunts, 6-8 p.m., Cappon House Museum, 228 W. Ninth St.; $8-$10; (616) 796-3329. Discover old Halloween traditions at the house of Holland's first mayor. Hear ghost stories and have your fortune told. Thursday: Live at the Park Theatre: Genetics, 8 p.m., Park Theatre, 248 S. River Ave.; $7-$10; (616) 929-9249. Why wait for the weekend to enjoy some live music? Go hear the Genetics at The Park. Friday: Crane's Orchard Corn Maze, 10 a.m.-6 p.m., Crane Orchards, 6054 124th Ave., Fennville; $5-$7; (269) 561-8651. Take the challenge of a 20-acre corn maze. By Staff report
